SEARCH
Package models.exam

Class AbstractExam<E>

java.lang.Object
models.exam.AbstractExam<E>
Type Parameters:
E - Grade attribute type. It can be an Integer or an ArrayList
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComposedExam, SimpleExam
public abstract class AbstractExam<E> extends Object
Abstract class for exams. Created to take advantage of polymorphism
See Also:
